description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共山东省委副书记、中共青岛市委书记、青岛市市长等职务。后因腐败犯罪被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC, Secretary of the Qingdao Municipal Committee of the CPC, and Mayor of Qingdao. He was later sentenced to life imprisonment for corruption.

nodes.id: 第八届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第八届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 越南华裔女商人，因与包括杜世成在内的多名高官有染并涉及腐败案件而知名。
description.en: A Vietnamese-born Chinese businesswoman known for her involvement in corruption cases and relationships with several high-ranking officials, including Du Shicheng.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 福建省厦门市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 福建省厦门市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 杜世成与女商人李薇有不正当关系，并伙同其收受财物。
description.en: Du Shicheng had an improper relationship with businesswoman Li Wei and colluded with her to accept bribes.

description.zh-cn: 杜世成于2000年10月至2001年2月任代理市长，2001年2月至2003年1月任市长。
description.en: Du Shicheng served as Acting Mayor from October 2000 to February 2001, and as Mayor from February 2001 to January 2003.

relationships.target: 中国共产党山东省委员会

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee, Deputy Secretary

relationships.target: 中国共产党青岛市委员会
中国共产党第十六届中央委员会
第八届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在1997年4月至2002年6月期间，杜世成担任山东省副省长，而吴官正时任中共山东省委书记，杜世成为吴官正的下属。
description.en: From April 1997 to June 2002, Du Shicheng served as Vice Governor of Shandong Province, while Wu Guanzheng was the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC, making Du his subordinate.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 因严重违犯党纪，经中共中央批准，杜世成被免去所有职务。
description.en: Due to serious violations of party discipline, Du Shicheng was removed from all his posts with the approval of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 经中共中央纪委常委会议审议并报中共中央政治局决定，给予杜世成开除党籍、开除公职（双开）处分。
description.en: After deliberation by the Standing Committee of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and approval by the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Du Shicheng was expelled from the Party and removed from public office.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第七次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 会议确认了之前由中共中央政治局作出的给予杜世成开除党籍的处分。
description.en: The plenum confirmed the previous decision made by the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee to expel Du Shicheng from the Party.

relationships.source: 福建省厦门市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 以受贿罪作出一审判决，判处杜世成无期徒刑、剥夺政治权利终身、没收个人全部财产。
description.en: In the first-instance judgment, Du Shicheng was sentenced to life imprisonment, deprived of political rights for life, and had all his personal property confiscated for the crime of bribery.

description.zh-cn: 杜世成接替王家瑞，出任青岛市代理市长。
description.en: Du Shicheng succeeded Wang Jiarui as the acting mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 夏耕接替杜世成，出任青岛市市长。
description.en: Xia Geng succeeded Du Shicheng as the mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 杜世成接替张惠来，出任中共青岛市委书记。
description.en: Du Shicheng succeeded Zhang Huilai as the Secretary of the CPC Qingdao Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在杜世成被免职后，阎启俊接任其青岛市委书记职务。
description.en: After Du Shicheng was removed from office, Yan Qijun succeeded him as the Secretary of the CPC Qingdao Municipal Committee.
